## Source: amazon-inspector (2094e4c510f7d9f01acaf3dcdb4e2fda46afbe56f235d8168d81bcb984e52fc3)
The package tripica-library was found to contain malicious code.

## Source: ossf-package-analysis (4aad2e8ed1a98fda3be6ae6f8dd9efcdf30b15c58728a881bb5930a00bf05733)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'tripica-library' @ 999.1.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
